pages.text: Here you can find a visualisation of how to build smallest "$(1)Induction Matrix$(reset)".$(br)This machine is needed to store large amounts of energy.$(br)Feel free to change $(1)Induction Cell/Induction Provider$(reset) inside to more advanced ones (later).

pages.name: Induction Matrix
pages.text: (Click Visualize even if it appears blank)$(br)Place it somewhere in a world, but make sure that it doesn't cross any chunk borders ($(l)F3 + G$(reset) to see chunk borders).
